Uses of Package
polito.sdp2017.HardwareInterface

  • Packages that use polito.sdp2017.HardwareInterface 
    Package Description
    polito.sdp2017.Components  
    polito.sdp2017.HardwareInterface  
    polito.sdp2017.VhdlInterface  
  • Classes in polito.sdp2017.HardwareInterface used by polito.sdp2017.Components 
    Class and Description
    HardwareInterface
    An hardware interface is a description of a certain hardware block in a formal Hardware Description Language.
  • Classes in polito.sdp2017.HardwareInterface used by polito.sdp2017.HardwareInterface 
    Class and Description
    Generic
    The Generic interface represent a generic parameter in the HDL description of any hardware component.
    Hdl
    The Hdl enum is a list of the languages supported by the design environment.
    Pin
    The Pin interface represent the communication ports with which an hardware block communicates with the external world; a Pin is normally characterized by a name which identifies it, a type, a direction and a dimension, which is the parallelism of the port.
  • Classes in polito.sdp2017.HardwareInterface used by polito.sdp2017.VhdlInterface 
    Class and Description
    Generic
    The Generic interface represent a generic parameter in the HDL description of any hardware component.
    HardwareInterface
    An hardware interface is a description of a certain hardware block in a formal Hardware Description Language.
    Hdl
    The Hdl enum is a list of the languages supported by the design environment.
    Pin
    The Pin interface represent the communication ports with which an hardware block communicates with the external world; a Pin is normally characterized by a name which identifies it, a type, a direction and a dimension, which is the parallelism of the port.
